column4: What did I help you with before, nvid drivers?
Hm, well you can extract the file to your home folder then... use the mv command to move it to that directory.
Tell me what's inside the zip file, so I can give you a more specific command
You can also try... Alt +F2 --> gksu nautilus
And just copying, and pasting the files.
What directory do you want created/
You can you usplash I think.
Then once installed run it, from Sys>pref> usplash
